comments.body: I wonder what difference this makes. Could you give an example?

The difference is when you create a helper method

```scala
def checkFoo()(implicit pos: Position): Unit = {
  assertNoDiff("a", "b")
}
checkFoo()
```

Before this change the, `(MySuite.scala:103)` suffix in scalatest failures would point to the line inside the definition of `checkFoo` while after this change the suffix would point to the line number where `checkFoo()` is called. When you have many 

```
checkFoo()
checkFoo()
...
```
this helps to track down the failure.
